scripts.cy:run-reports: npm run clean:reports && npx cypress run --browser chrome && npm run generate:mochawesome-report
scripts.generate:mochawesome-report: shx mkdir -p cypress/results/combined && npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > cypress/results/combined/combined-report.json && npx marge cypress/results/combined/combined-report.json -o cypress/results/combined
scripts.copy:report: npm run clean:docs && shx mkdir -p docs && shx cp cypress/results/combined/combined-report.html docs/index.html && echo '' > docs/.nojekyll
